trans-unit.source: Because <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is written in the Java programming language, you have great flexibility in how you choose to configure your deployment.

seg-source.mrk: Because <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is written in the Java programming language, you have great flexibility in how you choose to configure your deployment.

target.mrk: Because <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is written in the Java programming language, you have great flexibility in how you choose to configure your deployment.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can run <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, the JDBC server framework, and another application in the same JVM as a single process.

seg-source.mrk: For example, you can run <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, the JDBC server framework, and another application in the same JVM as a single process.

target.mrk: For example, you can run <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, the JDBC server framework, and another application in the same JVM as a single process.
